review: after just 3 hours of gameplay im completely hooked the atmosphere is extraordinary its all about exploring the world and finding your own path which is a refreshing change from the tragic dramatic or heroic motivations we usually see in games the characters are adorable you want to see them thrive and grow as you learn the fundamentals of the gameplay the alchemy system is of course welldesigned and very enjoyable combat doesnt lag behind eitherits worthy of a great jrpg

review: this was my first game of the atelier series and i found it enjoyable chill and wholesome the storytelling and graphics are not worldclass but work well with the amazing soundtrack some parts of the story were relatable and even inspirational the synthesis and combat system may seem confusing at first but i understood it after a bit of practice  i recommend this game if you want a jrpg that combines action drama and comfy slice of life moments
